remarks: The sum of two group sums.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 25-Apr-2016.)  Obsolete version of ~ gsumzadd as of 5-Jun-2019. (New usage is discouraged.)  (Proof modification is discouraged.)
statement:
gsumzaddOLD.b $e |- B = ( Base ` G ) $.
gsumzaddOLD.0 $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` G ) $.
gsumzaddOLD.p $e |- .+ = ( +g ` G ) $.
gsumzaddOLD.z $e |- Z = ( Cntz ` G ) $.
gsumzaddOLD.g $e |- ( ph -> G e. Mnd ) $.
gsumzaddOLD.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. V ) $.
gsumzaddOLD.fn $e |- ( ph -> ( `' F " ( _V \ { .0. } ) ) e. Fin ) $.
gsumzaddOLD.hn $e |- ( ph -> ( `' H " ( _V \ { .0. } ) ) e. Fin ) $.
gsumzaddOLD.s $e |- ( ph -> S e. ( SubMnd ` G ) ) $.
gsumzaddOLD.c $e |- ( ph -> S C_ ( Z ` S ) ) $.
gsumzaddOLD.f $e |- ( ph -> F : A --> S ) $.
gsumzaddOLD.h $e |- ( ph -> H : A --> S ) $.
gsumzaddOLD $p |- ( ph -> ( G gsum ( F oF .+ H ) ) = ( ( G gsum F ) .+ ( G gsum H ) ) ) $.
